description: Non-Material Amendment Application (S96A) to vary Condition 2 (Approved Plans) of planning permission reference 11016/APP/2024/2504, dated 04-12-2024, for the â??Construction of a two-storey side extension, single-storey rear extension, and amendments to fenestrations following garage demolition.â?? Amendment seeking internal alterations.
decision_conditions: Condition 2 (Accordance with Approved Plans) of planning permission reference 11016/APP/2024/2504, dated 04-12-2024, is amended to:
The development hereby permitted shall not be carried out except in complete accordance with the details shown on the Drawing Nos:
Title: Location Plan, ref: PP-13415520v2, dated: 19-Sep-2024;
Title: Proposed Site Plan, ref: 24/3648/12, dated: 29/08/24;
Title: Proposed Floor Plans, ref: 24/3648/15, rev: C, dated: 29/08/24;
Title: Proposed Elevations, ref: 24/3648/16, rev: C, dated: 29/08/24;
Title: Proposed Street Scene, ref: 24/3648/07, dated: 29/08/24;
and shall thereafter be retained/maintained for as long as the development remains in existence.
To ensure the development complies with the provisions of the Hillingdon Local Plan Part 1 (2012) and Part 2 (2020), and the London Plan (2021).

Notwithstanding the non-material amendments hereby approved, other than Condition 2, which is superseded by the above conditions, all other conditions relating to Planning Permission Ref: 11016/APP/2024/2504, dated 04-12-2024, must be discharged/adhered to as per that permission.
The following plans have been SUPERSEDED:
Title: Proposed Site Plan, ref: 24/3648/02, dated: 29/08/24;
Title: Proposed Floor Plans, ref: 24/3648/05, dated: 29/08/24;
Title: Proposed Elevations, ref: 24/3648/06A, rev: A, dated: 29/08/24;
The following plans have been APPROVED:
Title: Proposed Site Plan, ref: 24/3648/12, dated: 29/08/24;
Title: Proposed Floor Plans, ref: 24/3648/15, rev: C, dated: 29/08/24;
Title: Proposed Elevations, ref: 24/3648/16, rev: C, dated: 29/08/24;
